post.title: if any one wants to contact me
post.body:
if you have questions message me on tox or send me a email on bit message do not send me a message using zeromail or any zeronet messaging service of you want my tox just pm me on bitmessage and i will send it to you also make sure your time to live is set to a few days im not always online and im not very active on zeronet so i highly recommend you contact me using bitmessage or toxÂ 

BM-2cTEu9N7s1zxefeYTahN88HZQSDqB43A5R

post.title: im now on kopykate
post.body: run down to [Big Kopykate](/big.kopykate.bit/) I've uploaded two videos there its not going to be very active but i will try to spare some time and make a video or just upload some thing i like when i can

post.title: peertube looks cool
post.body: peer tube is a federate media streaming service like youtube and unlike bitchute you can make your own instance of peertube its sort of like [mastodon social](https://mastodon.social/) and it doesn't look scammy unlike [Dtube](https://d.tube/) if you wanna take a peek at the source code heres the link to the git page [click me](https://github.com/Chocobozzz/PeerTube)

post.title: whats the point of bitchute
post.body: what is the point of bitchute using webtorrents its a centralized service and you can watch it with out webtorrent i mean if you want to download the videos on there you can with webtorrent you can also seed them but it seems point less to me if you want to be a true p2p service go all the way half way you have this cluster fuck hybrid system that is point less to use i mean come on why did you even bother

post.title: i came back to zeronet
post.body: ive been gone but i came crawling back i dont know why i keep leaving but at lest i have backed up my user.json so even if i did leave i would be able to come back i would just lose my blog again

post.title: welcome to my new blog
post.body:
hey guys i just made a new zeronet blog if you feel like donating to me heres my crypto coin addresses please dont beg me for coins i dont have any thats why im pan handling right now
